content: a conversation between two friends during an annual yarn day celebration a boho chic crochet cowl was started using every stitch from a slip_stitch to a treble_crochet stitch including extended stitches the slope boho crochet cowl offers a unique shape that can be worn different ways add some texture and contrast with the reverse single_crochet this one size cowl works up quickly with less than three skeins of worsted weight yarn and can be worn with and without jackets and coats all fall and winter long skill level intermediate finished size 23 w x 24 l \ 58 4 cm x 61 cm l\ i invite you to join the confidently crochet with creations by courtney on facebook for exclusive coupons giveaways and more take me there http //www facebook com/groups/creationsbycourt buy more save more \*\*shop10\*\* save 10% on 3-8 patterns \*\*shop15\*\* save 15% on 9-14 patterns \*\*shop25\*\* save 25% on 15+ patterns all patterns must be in your cart at the time of purchase to receive the discount all crochet patterns are thoroughly tested by various levels of crocheters and/or tech edited for clarity and accuracy if you require any assistance with a pattern i can be contacted by email pattern will be instantly available for download upon receipt of payment due to the nature of this digital product refunds will not be issued ©2024 this pattern is not to be duplicated or resold and not to be reproduced commercially you may sell finished products on etsy at farmers markets and craft fairs but please credit creations by courtney as the pattern s author
